TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUpdatable

summary.span: HTTP POST 方法用于插入或更新资源的接口。

span.span: An interface used to insert or update a resource by the HTTP POST method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口与资源无关。The interface is resource independent. 返回表示资源的对象的方法可以返回任何内容。The methods that return objects representing resources can return anything. 返回的对象是表示资源的不透明对象。The returned object is an opaque object that represents the resource. 若要使用引用来读取或更新值，则会将相同的不透明对象传递回 。To use the reference to read or update a value, the same opaque object is passed back to . 的实现 必须跟踪此不透明对象与它所表示的对象之间的映射。Implementation of must track the mapping between this opaque object to the object it represents. 如果对资源进行序列化并且需要正确类型的公共语言运行时（CLR）实例， 则使用不透明对象调用上的 ResolveResource 方法。When the resource is serialized and a common language runtime (CLR) instance of the correct type is needed, the ResolveResource method on is called with the opaque object. 若要序列化对象，请 对调用方法 。To serialize the object, call the method on .

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddReferenceToCollection (object targetResource, string propertyName, object resourceToBeAdded);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddReferenceToCollection(object targetResource, string propertyName, object resourceToBeAdded) cil managed
Public Sub AddReferenceToCollection (targetResource As Object, propertyName As String, resourceToBeAdded As Object)
public: void AddReferenceToCollection(System::Object ^ targetResource, System::String ^ propertyName, System::Object ^ resourceToBeAdded);
abstract member AddReferenceToCollection : obj * string * obj -> unit

param.name: targetResource
param.span: 用于定义属性的目标对象。

span.span: Target object that defines the property.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 应向其中添加资源的集合属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the collection property to which the resource should be added.

param.name: resourceToBeAdded
param.span: 表示要添加的资源的不透明对象。

span.span: The opaque object representing the resource to be added.
Adds the specified value to the collection.

span.span: Cancels a change to the data.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateResource (string containerName, string fullTypeName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateResource(string containerName, string fullTypeName) cil managed
Public Function CreateResource (containerName As String, fullTypeName As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ CreateResource(System::String ^ containerName, System::String ^ fullTypeName);
abstract member CreateResource : string * string -> obj

param.name: containerName
param.span: 资源所属实体集的名称。

span.span: The name of the entity set to which the resource belongs.

param.name: fullTypeName
param.span: 资源的完全限定命名空间类型名称。

span.span: The full namespace-qualified type name of the resource.

summary.span: 创建具有指定类型并属于指定容器的资源。

span.span: Creates the resource of the specified type and that belongs to the specified container.

returns.span: 表示指定类型的资源并属于指定容器的对象。

span.span: The object representing a resource of specified type and belonging to the specified container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用以通过 HTTP POST 方法插入新资源。 is called to insert a new resource by the HTTP POST method. 第一个参数指向资源所属的容器，第二个参数是需要创建的资源类型的命名空间限定名称。The first parameter points to the container that the resource belongs to and the second parameter is the namespace-qualified name of the resource type that needs to be created. 使用继承时，第二个参数最有用。The second parameter is most useful when using inheritance. 返回类型不需要是资源的实际 CLR 实例。The return type need not be the actual CLR instance of the resource. 它可以是实现所需的任何内容（例如，cookie）。It can be anything, for example, a cookie, that the implementation requires.

public: void DeleteResource(System::Object ^ targetResource);

param.name: targetResource
param.span: 要删除的资源。

span.span: The resource to be deleted.
Deletes the specified resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `targetResource`是或返回的不透明对象 。The `targetResource` is the opaque object returned by or .

param.name: query
param.span: 指向特定资源的语言集成查询 (LINQ)。

span.span: Language integrated query (LINQ) pointing to a particular resource.

param.name: fullTypeName
param.span: 资源的完全限定类型名称。

span.span: The fully qualified type name of resource.

summary.span: 获取查询和类型名称所标识的指定类型的资源。

span.span: Gets the resource of the specified type identified by a query and type name.

returns.span: 表示指定类型的资源的不透明对象（由指定查询引用）。

span.span: An opaque object representing a resource of the specified type, referenced by the specified query.

param.name: targetResource
param.span: 一个表示资源的不透明对象。

span.span: An opaque object that represents a resource.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 需要检索其值的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property whose value needs to be retrieved.

summary.span: 获取目标对象的指定属性的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the specified property on the target object.
The value of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为标量属性或复杂属性调用此方法。This method is called for scalar properties or complex properties. 对于标量属性，返回的对象应该是实际值。For a scalar property, the returned object should be the actual value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoveReferenceFromCollection (object targetResource, string propertyName, object resourceToBeRemoved);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveReferenceFromCollection(object targetResource, string propertyName, object resourceToBeRemoved) cil managed
Public Sub RemoveReferenceFromCollection (targetResource As Object, propertyName As String, resourceToBeRemoved As Object)

param.name: targetResource
param.span: 用于定义属性的目标对象。

span.span: The target object that defines the property.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 需要更新其值的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property whose value needs to be updated.

param.name: resourceToBeRemoved
param.span: 需要移除的属性值。

span.span: The property value that needs to be removed.
Removes the specified value from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从目标对象上的导航属性所标识的集合中删除指定的资源。Removes the specified resource from the collection identified by a navigation property on the target object. 此操作删除由关系绑定的两个资源对象之间的关系。This operation deletes the relationship between the two resource objects bound by the relationship.

public: System::Object ^ ResetResource(System::Object ^ resource);

param.name: resource
param.span: 要更新的资源。

span.span: The resource to be updated.

summary.span: 将由参数 标识的资源重置为其默认值。

span.span: Resets the resource identified by the parameter to its default value.

returns.span: 其值已重置为默认值的资源。

span.span: The resource with its value reset to the default value.

MemberSignature.Value: public object ResolveResource (object resource);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ResolveResource(object resource) cil managed
Public Function ResolveResource (resource As Object) As Object
public: System::Object ^ ResolveResource(System::Object ^ resource);
abstract member ResolveResource : obj -> obj

param.name: resource
param.span: 表示需要检索其实例的资源的对象。

span.span: The object representing the resource whose instance needs to be retrieved.

summary.span: 返回由指定资源对象表示的资源的实例。

span.span: Returns the instance of the resource represented by the specified resource object.

returns.span: 由指定资源对象表示的资源的实例。

span.span: The instance of the resource represented by the specified resource object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可将或 API 返回的不透明对象 解析 到 CLR 实例中。This method is called to resolve the opaque object returned by the or API into the CLR instance. 通常，在 对 POST 方法的资源进行序列化后调用此方法。This is normally called after to serialize the resource for POST methods. 如果有在公共语言运行时（CLR）资源实例中调用的更新侦听器，也会调用此方法。This method is also called if there are update interceptors invoked with the common language runtime (CLR) resource instances. 如果提供程序支持乐观并发，且资源类型 在基于 CLR 的提供程序中定义了并发标记，则可以使用此方法。It can be used if the provider supports optimistic concurrency and the resource type has concurrency tokens defined by in a CLR-based provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveChanges ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SaveChanges() cil managed
Public Sub SaveChanges ()
public: void SaveChanges();
abstract member SaveChanges : unit -> unit

summary.span: 保存所有使用 API 进行的更改。

span.span: Saves all the changes that have been made by using the APIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用 之前，实现必须跟踪所有更改 ，并在调用时保存所有更改 。The implementation must track all changes until is called and then save all changes when is called. 此 实现应保存所有更改或同时拒绝所有更改。The implementation is expected to save all of the changes or to reject all of the changes together.
